message.content:
1. The trial was double-blind.
2. The trial was randomized.
3. The trial was controlled.
4. The trial involved infants.
5. The age range of the infants was 1 to 12 months.
6. The infants were diagnosed in the emergency department.
7. The diagnosis for the infants was moderate-to-severe bronchiolitis.

messages.content:
Statement: This was a double-blind, randomized controlled trial on infants (1 to 12 months) who were diagnosed in the emergency department with moderate-to-severe bronchiolitis.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
